Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: These XRD studies clearly manifest the enhancement of molecular ordering within thin films of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO after annealing , which are in agreement with the observation that hole mobilities of devices increase with annealing.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| enhancement of molecular ordering |
| thin films of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO |
| hole mobilities of devices |

The three "Property Value" entities identified in the paragraph are "enhancement of molecular ordering," "thin films of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO," and "hole mobilities of devices." These entities represent the properties or characteristics that are being discussed or observed in the context of the XRD studies and device annealing.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| enhancement of molecular ordering |
| hole mobilities of devices |

After reviewing the original paragraph, I have identified two "Property Value" entities that clearly refer to the value of material properties. These entities are "enhancement of molecular ordering" and "hole mobilities of devices." The other entity, "thin films of PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO," is not a property value, but rather a description of the physical state of the materials being studied. Therefore, it has been excluded from the final list.
